snippet.title: Lunar Drifter | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Arcade First Person Shooter, your mission is to tear, blast, and crush an entire legion as fast as possible within the time limit.
Featuring 4 playable characters with their own gimmicks and arsenal, more than 10 beautiful hand-crafted levels, and includes online Co-Op!

WISHLIST NOW!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3115490/Lunar_Drifter/
Website: https://rosehoodgames.com/
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/7AkAkFkSfX
Twitter / X : https://x.com/RoseHoodGames1
